basics.name: Daniele Di Mauro
basics.label: Computer Vision and Machine learning Specialist
basics.summary: An Italian-born specialist in machine learning and computer vision with a strong focus on designing and developing algorithms for applications such as indoor navigation, underwater 3D reconstruction, egocentric vision, and domain adaptation. Complemented by experience in the design and implementation of distributed systems. Proficient in utilizing cutting-edge technologies.

work.name: Next Vision s.r.l.
work.summary: Designed and developed computer vision algorithms for indoor navigation, underwater 3D reconstruction, egocentric vision, and domain adaptation.

work.name: NCE s.r.l.
work.summary: Designed and developed a client-server audio/video streaming system. Responsible for UI design and development using Eclipse RCP. Served as a database analyst.

work.name: CrowdEngineering
work.summary: Designed and developed Ajax-based web functionality for CRM software.

work.name: Offerte tour operator
work.summary: Designed and developed a search engine for travel offers using SOAP web service aggregation in Java (JBoss). Created and implemented both SOAP and RESTful APIs to retrieve aggregated data. Developed a web application to consume the API data, based on AngularJS. Gained exposure to MySQL and Oracle databases.

education.area: Scene Understanding for Parking Spaces Management
education.studyType: PhD in Mathematics and Computer Science

education.area: Shape analysis and automatic classification of decorative patterns
Visualization of geographical data through 3D modeling and python scripting.
Courses on Timed Automata and Data Mining
Worked on teleguide system for a robot ended in a pubblication
